# CarIntel - AI-Powered Car Buying Assistant

> CarIntel is the first AI-powered car buying application for iOS. It helps car buyers make informed decisions with instant vehicle analysis, market values, recall alerts, and negotiation assistance.

## About CarIntel

CarIntel LLC develops mobile applications that leverage artificial intelligence to assist consumers in the car buying process. Our flagship iOS app provides comprehensive vehicle information and AI-driven insights to help buyers negotiate better deals and avoid costly mistakes.

## Key Features

- **Instant VIN Lookup**: Enter or scan a VIN to get comprehensive vehicle specifications including engine, transmission, and fuel economy
- **AI-Powered Analysis**: Advanced AI identifies known problems, estimates repair costs, and provides buy/avoid recommendations with test drive tips
- **Real-Time Market Values**: Live market data showing if you're getting a great deal, fair price, or being overpriced with comparable sales
- **Safety and Recall Alerts**: Active recall alerts from NHTSA, safety ratings, crash test results, and complaint history
- **Negotiation Helper**: AI-calculated offer prices, walk-away thresholds, and negotiation talking points specific to your vehicle
- **Listing Price Checker**: Paste any online car listing URL to extract details, compare to market value, and determine if it's worth pursuing

## Product Information

- **App Name**: CarIntel
- **Platform**: iOS (Available Now)
- **App Store**: https://apps.apple.com/us/app/carintel/id6758071767
- **Category**: Automotive / Shopping / Utilities
- **Developer**: CarIntel LLC
- **Website**: https://carintel.ai
- **Contact**: carintelapp@gmail.com

## Target Users

- First-time car buyers seeking guidance
- Used car shoppers wanting to avoid scams
- Anyone looking to negotiate better car deals
- Consumers wanting comprehensive vehicle history and market data

## How CarIntel Works

1. User enters a VIN number or scans it with phone camera
2. App retrieves comprehensive vehicle data from multiple sources
3. AI analyzes the vehicle for known issues, recalls, and market positioning
4. User receives actionable insights including fair market value and negotiation strategies
5. App provides test drive checklist and questions to ask the seller

- Homepage: https://carintel.ai

## Summary

CarIntel is the essential tool for smart car buying. By combining real-time market data with AI-powered analysis, it gives buyers the confidence to make informed decisions and negotiate from a position of strength. Available now on the iOS App Store.
